name: Bio Island Milk Calcium 90 Capsules
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Bio Island Milk Calcium is suitable for use by young infants from the age of 4 weeks, the dosages are based on the Recommended Daily Intakes (RDI) and Adequate Intakes (AI) established by the NHMRC (National Health & Research Council).
Using easy to obtain calcium and vitamin D to build strong bones and teeth. With calcium formulated from cow's milk, this product as a daily supplement is beneficial for growth and maintenance of strong, healthy bones. Calcium is also essential from cellular structure, muscle contraction, nerve transmission, enzyme activation and hormone function. Adequate dietary calcium in youth is required to maximise bones and tissues, while vitamin D helps calcium absorption & the immune system. Vitamin D also plays a role in aiding normal regulation of blood sugar in a healthy body.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      EACH CAPSULE CONTAINS:Hydroxyapatite   270mgEquiv. to calcium   78 mgCholecalciferol (vitamin D)   2.5 µg
    
    
      Directions
      Children aged 4 weeks - 6 months take 1 capsule; 7 months -1 year take 2 capsules;1-3 years take 2 - 3 capsules; 4-9 years take 3-4 capsules, or as directed by your healthcare professional. Please take with meal.
*For children under 4 years, twist or cut the capsule tail and squeeze the contents onto a spoon. The contents can then be administered into the mouth, using the spoon. Alternatively, the dosage can be squeezed onto food.
    
    
      Indications

name: Bio Island Cod Liver + Fish Oil 90 Capsules
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Bio Island Cod Liver + Fish Oil is suitable for use by young infants from the age of 4 weeks, The dosages are based on the Recommended Daily Intakes (RDI) and Adequate Intakes (AI) established by the NHMRC (National Health & Research Council).
Each capsule contains a blend of nutrients to support the many needs of growing kids. Fish oil contains vital omega-3 unsaturated fatty acids DHA & EPA, which can only be sourced through diet. Cod liver oil is a rich source of vitamins A & D. Vitamin A, with added vitamin E, plays a role in immune mechanisms and vitamin D plays a role in the body in calcium absorption.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions

      Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

name: Bio Island DHA for Pregnancy 60 Softgel Capsules
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Bio Island DHA For Pregnancy is suitable for use by adults including pregnancy and breastfeeding women, the dosages are based on the Recommended Daily Intakes (RDI) and Adequate Intakes (AI) established by the NHMRC (National Health & Research Council).
Sourced naturally from algae, which contains a rich source of docosahexaenoic acid (DHA), an omega-3 fatty acid. Bio Island DHA for Pregnancy contains a concentrated DHA dose. DHA is essential for growth and development of the brain during foetal, neonatal and infant stages. Maternal DHA intake also provides the dual benefits of supporting healthy eye function, nervous system and cognitive function for both mother and child, and can be used during all pregnancy stages, including women trying to conceive or while breastfeeding. Taken daily Bio Island DHA for pregnancy can also help maintain positive wellbeing.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Keep out of reach of children.
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      
    
    
      Directions
      Women trying to conceive and pregnant women between 0 - 10 weeks in their pregnancy take 1 capsule daily. Pregnant women between 10 - 36 weeks and breastfeeding mothers take 2-3 cpaules daily or as directed by your health care professional.
    
    
      Indications

name: Bio Island Zinc 120 Chewable Tablets
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Bio Island Zinc is suitable for use by children from the age of 1 year, the dosages are based on the Recommended Daily Intakes (RDI) and Adequate Intakes (AI) established by the NHMRC (National Health & Research Council).
Supplements zinc which may help maintain healthy immune function and blood sugar balance. This product contains zinc, which is an essential trace mineral that is a component in over 200 enzymes in the body. Zinc is an important nutritional antioxidant, thereby assisting in protecting the body against the damaging effects of free radicals and it support the health and function of the immune system. It may also assist in the maintenance of normal healthy blood sugar balance in healthy children. As zinc is involved in carbohydrate metabolism, protein synthesis and cell growth, it helps to maintain healthy skin, vision and eye function and it is necessary for the proper action of many body hormones.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      EACH TABLET CONTAINS:Zinc Gluconate  21mgEquiv. to zinc  3mg
    
    
      Directions
      Children aged 1 - 8 years take 1 tablet;9 - 12 years take 2 tablets, or as directed by your healthcare professional*Tablets to be chewed. Recommended for children who can thoroughly chew and safely swallow without supervision. For children under 3 years, please crumble the tablet before chewing.
    
    
      Indications

Information

      Bio Island Kangaroo Essence 50000 contains powerful concentrated kangaroo meat powder. The kangaroo is a well-regarded animal for its strength and vigour, and it has long been used in Australia as a nutritive food. Kangaroo meat is high in protein and low in fat. Uniquely Australian Bio Island Kangaroo Essence 50000 offers an essential potent dose of nutrition for both males and females.

description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Bio Island Lysine Step Up for Youth is deliciously blackcurrant flavoured and contains lysine, an essential amino acid that supports healthy growth and immune function for children, adolescents and young adults. Bio Island Lysine Step Up for Youth supports a variety of body functions during periods of growth and development, where calcium, protein and energy are beneficial. Lysine supports collagen formation and tissue repair, which is important for skin health, muscle growth and wound healing. It assists calcium absorption that helps maintain normal bone structure. It also plays a vital role in the production of energy and carbohydrate metabolism, which may help with the daily energy needs of all ages.

name: Bio Island Immune Protect Propolis 400 Capsules
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Bio Island Immune Protect Propolis is a high strength formula which helps support and maintain a health immune system. The antioxidant functions of propolis assist in protecting the body from harmful effects of free radicals and oxidative stress. Commonly known as a cold tonic, it provides assistance in the treatment of colds and symptoms by reducing their severity and duration. It can also help reduce upper respiratory tract infections and is traditionally used in herbal medicine to help relieve a sore throat. Bio Island Immune Protect Propolis helps in the maintenance of general well-being.
    
    
      Miscellaneous

name: Bio Island Eyesight Support
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Bio Island Eyesight Support is enriched with bilberry and marigold to support eye function and visual stability. The high concentration of bilberry is commonly used as a medicinal herb as it contains anthocyanins, which are potent antioxidants that scavenge free radicals and protect cells against oxidative damage. Combined with marigold, which properties aid in filtering harmful high-energy blue wavelengths of light. Marigold also protects the eye from damage caused by free radicals due to the high volume of antioxidants, helping maintain healthy cells and reduce the risk of chronic eye disease. Bio Island Eyesight Support may improve night vision, slow macular degeneration and prevent cataracts. Offering a unique formula Bio Island Eyesight Support may aid and assist in the maintenance of general wellbeing.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Keep out of reach of children

name: Bio Island Lysine Starter for Kids 150g Oral Powder
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      The deliciously blackcurrant flavoured Bio Island Lysine Starter for Kids is easy to digest in this convenient powdered form. It contains the essential amino acid lysine, that supports healthy growth and improves appetite for infants and young children.Bio Island Lysine Starter for Kids supports calcium absorption, that helps maintain normal bone structure. Each body cell requires lysine to build proteins, that provides essential nutrients for bodily processes including collagen formation. Lysine can improve appetite and promote growth, especially in young children who may not be consuming enough of their dietary need. It also plays a vital role in the production for energy and carbohydrate metabolism, which may help children with their developing energy needs. As the body cannot product adequate amounts of Lysine, it must be obtained through the diet. Bio Island Lysine Starter for Kids is important for maintaining normal growth and general wellbeing for infants and young children.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      ALLERGEN INFORMATION: This product contains milk.Vitamin and mineral supplements should no replace a balanced diet. 
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      Each gram contains:Lysine Hydrochloride             115mg   Equiv to lysine                       92mg*1g scoop included
    
    
      Directions
      Children aged 4weeks - 6 months take 2 scoops (2g) daily; 7months-1 year take 3 scoops (3g) daily; 1-5 years take 4 scoops (4g) daily, or as directed by your healthcare professional. *Children 2+ years can dissolve powder in mouth with saliva, or mix with water, milk or juice as follows: Place 1/2 cup milk or lukewarm water into a container. Add the directed quantity of Bio Island Lysine Starter for Kids and stir until lightly dissolved. Add more milk or water to make up 1 cup. 
    
    
      Indications

name: Bio Island Liver Care & Detox 200 Vege Capsules
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Bio Island Liver Care + Detox is a high strength formula that contains a balanced blend of milk thistle, turmeric and taurine. Milk Thistle, as a liver protectant is traditionally used to maintain liver health and liver related conditions. As a powerful antioxidant, it protects the liver from damage caused by free radical damage or toxins such as alcohol or pollution. Bio Island Liver Care + Detox uses the added benefit of Turmeric, a popular spice with antioxidant properties that improves healthy liver detoxification. Taurine is processed in the liver to product bile salts, and it also functions as an antioxidant to protect the body against oxidative stress. This powerful blend is specifically formulated to help maintain healthy digestive function, in showing your liver proper care.

name: Bio Island Emu Oil 1000 200 Softgel Capsules
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Contains fatty acids to help improve blood cholesterol levels. Bio Island Emu Oil 1000 is made from 100% natural emu oil and brought to you in convenient capsule form. It contains a rich source of fatty acids - Omegas 3, 6, 7 and 9 that are found naturally in emu oil. The essential fatty acids omegas 3 and 6 cannot be formed in the body and can only be obtained through dietary sources. Research has found that a high total of blood cholesterol can lead to an increased risk of cardiovascular disease. By supporting normal cholesterol levels in health individuals, Bio Island Emu Oil 1000 helps maintain general health and wellbeing. Bio Island Emu Oil 1000 has natural antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties that can help ease joint and muscle pain, including arthritic conditions. It is also an idea supplement for reducing irritation and inflammation caused by skin disorders, including eczema and dermatitis resulting in naturally healthy looking skin.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      If symptoms persist, please consult your healthcare professional. Keep out of reach of children and do not use if deal on cap is missing, torn or broken.
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      Each capsule contains: Emu Oil     1000mg
    
    
      Directions
      For health and cholesterol maintenance: Adults take 1-2 capsules daily. For mild-moderate joint inflammation: Adults take 3 capsules, three times daily, or as directed by your healthcare professional.
    
    
      Indications

name: Bio Island Milk Calcium Bone Care 300 Softgel Capsules
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Bio Island Milk Calcium Bone Care softgel capsules are specifically formulated with calcium hydroxyapatite, a naturally sourced calcium supplement derived directly from cow’s milk that is effectively absorbed in the body. Calcium is an essential mineral stored in the skeleton for the development and maintenance of healthy bones, teeth, muscle contraction and nerve transmission, and is needed throughout different stages in life. Additional calcium supplementation may be beneficial during adolescence, post menopause, during pregnancy and while breastfeeding. Throughout these periods retention, stable intake and absorption of calcium is required to maximise skeletal bone structure and strength. Bio Island Milk Calcium Bone Care also combines vitamin D3 to enhance calcium absorption in the body, a diet deficient in calcium can lead to osteoporosis in later life. Each capsule also contains the added benefit of vitamin K2, which supports the binding of calcium in bones for stronger bone mineral density in adults. Vitamin K2 also helps to remove calcium from parts of the body where it should not be stored, such as soft tissue, by transporting the calcium to bones and teeth.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Mineral and vitamin supplements should not replace a balance diet. Keep out of reach of children.
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      Each soft gel capsule contains:Hydroxyapatite … 550mgEquiv. to calcium … 160 mgCholecalciferol (vitamin D3) … 6.25 µgMenaquinone 7 (vitamin K2) … 17.6 µg
    
    
      Directions
      Adolescents aged 12-18 years take 2-3 capsules daily; Adults aged 19-50 years take 2 capsules daily; Adults aged 51+ years take 2-3 capsules daily; Pregnant and breastfeeding women take 2-3 capsules daily, or as directed by your healthcare professional. Please take with meal. If symptoms persist consult your health care professional.
    
    
      Indications
